snippet.title: Darfall - New Preview | Paradox Arc
snippet.description:
Play a new Darfall Demo, with brand new graphics, and wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1961600/Darfall/

Darfall is a hero-based RPG city-building game that puts you in the role of a hero who must protect their home and help it flourish! During the day, you must grow your hero’s might, find epic loot, master new abilities, and build up your settlement. At night, survive the hordes of undead.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

#ParadoxInteractive #Paradox
